title: The Extraordinary Soil-Free Indoor Garden
description: AeroGrow International, Inc. is the leader in the rapidly growing indoor gardening market with a commitment to "Grow Anything... Anytime... Guaranteed."

asset.author: Miracle-Gro AeroGarden
asset.description: AeroGrow International, Inc. is the leader in the rapidly growing indoor gardening market with a commitment to "Grow Anything... Anytime... Guaranteed." http://www.aerogarden.com/

transcripts: Growing indoors absolutely soil free it's a gardeners dream come true. Now you can with Miracle-Gro Aerogarden a fully-automated growing system guaranteed to grow anywhere. Automated grow lights and it's adjustable arm provide the perfect growing environment that grow plants five times faster. Our preceded grow pods and specially balance liquid nutrients make indoor gardening effective and simple with a harvest ready in as little as four weeks, no guesswork just guaranteed growing all year long. Imagine an herb garden within arm's reach fresh tomatoes in December, fragrant flowers blooming year-round. it's like having a farmer's market in your own kitchen. It's time to bring growing inside with the Miracle-Gro Aerogarden. Now it's always gardening season.
